directions: Blend first 4 ingredients in blender until mixture has smooth slushy texture. (Daiquiris can be made 2 hours ahead. Place in freezer. Stir gently before serving.) Divide among 6 Champagne flutes or slender glasses. Garnish each daiquiri with mint sprig.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen limeade concentrate (do not thaw)
title: Blended Vodka Daiquiris with Lime and Mint
